title: Gary Bettman Tells Bruins That Mitchell Miller Can’t Play in the N.H.L.
description: On Friday, the Bruins signed the 20-year-old defenseman who was convicted in 2016 of abusing a Black classmate who had a developmental disability to an entry-level contract.
dc:creator: David Waldstein
media:description: “Nobody should think, at this point he is, or may ever be, N.H.L. eligible,” commissioner Gary Bettman said of Mitchell Miller.
